unnormalised: NGO 'Seva Bharat' collected ₹2.5 lakhs for flood relief in Assam. Donations poured in after their online appeal. 80% of the funds will be used for immediate aid like food packets costing Rs. 250 each.
normalised: N-G-O 'Seva Bharat' collected rupee two point five lakhs for flood relief in Assam. Donations poured in after their online appeal. eighty percent of the funds will be used for immediate aid like food packets costing rupees two hundred and fifty each.

unnormalised: Sources indicate a generous donation of $1000 came from an anonymous donor in the US. Rs. 50,000 was contributed via UPI, while older citizens preferred donating in Rs. 500 notes.
normalised: Sources indicate a generous donation of dollar one thousand came from an anonymous donor in the U-S. rupees fifty thousand was contributed via U-P-I, while older citizens preferred donating in rupees five hundred notes.

unnormalised: The org aims to raise a total of ₹5 lakhs by 15/08/2024. They're accepting donations in INR, USD, and GBP. Every rupee counts! They've partnered with local shops who are giving supplies at a 10% discount.
normalised: The org aims to raise a total of rupee five lakhs by fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four. They're accepting donations in I-N-R, U-S-D, and G-B-P. Every rupee counts! They've partnered with local shops who are giving supplies at a ten percent discount.

unnormalised: Many are donating in kind too: 2000 blankets worth about Rs. 300 each have arrived. This is such a blessing as winter is almost here.
normalised: Many are donating in kind too: two thousand blankets worth about rupees three hundred each have arrived. This is such a blessing as winter is almost here.

unnormalised: The CEO, Ms. Priya Sharma, said, "We are grateful for the overwhelming support. Every Rs. 100 we get makes a big difference." She plans to personally visit the flood-affected areas.
normalised: The C-E-O, Ms. Priya Sharma, said, "We are grateful for the overwhelming support. Every rupees one hundred we get makes a big difference." She plans to personally visit the flood-affected areas.

unnormalised: A camp office has been set up where people can donate clothes, medicines costing Rs. 50 upward or money. Even a donation of Rs. 50 will go a long way.
normalised: A camp office has been set up where people can donate clothes, medicines costing rupees fifty upward or money. Even a donation of rupees fifty will go a long way.

unnormalised: Their bank details are available on their website. You can transfer via NEFT, RTGS, IMPS, or even use your credit card! They're targeting a figure of ₹7 lakhs by end of this month to reach many more.
normalised: Their bank details are available on their website. You can transfer via N-E-F-T, R-T-G-S, I-M-P-S, or even use your credit card! They're targeting a figure of rupee seven lakhs by end of this month to reach many more.
